title: Ping Pong Pilot
description: Created a ping pong serving robot using LegoEV3, consisting of motors, ultrasonic, color and     gyro sensor. Coded in C using RobotC

title: Touchless Trash Can
description: Built a smart trash using an arduino with ultrasonic sensors, buzzers and servo motors, to automate lid movement based on proximity. Created user friendly GUI using the C# and .NET framework to make windows form app for disposal reminders.

title: Vex Robot
description: Designed and built a robot using Vex parts and Vex code, which utilized python programming. Implemented autonomous driving which allowed the robot to navigate through the competition field with precision.

title: Cane For The Blind
description: Designed and built a walking stick for the blind which measures distance using an ultrasonic sensor, and sounds using the buzzer to alert distance.
